c74object.name: fl.dispatch~
c74object.digest: Dispatches multiple inputs dynamically to multiple outputs.
c74object.description: Each output can be independently connected to any one input. The number of inputs and outputs is variable. The selected input for each output is changed with a parameter.

entry.name: 3. /input_01 [int]
entry.description: Sets the current input for output 1 counting from 1 (off if out of range).

entry.name: 4. /input_02 [int]
entry.description: Sets the current input for output 2 counting from 1 (off if out of range).
